amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-249 to exempt State law enforcement actions from the impact of the legislation to ensure that Attorneys General and State agencies can enforce State consumer protection laws concerning mislabeling or other unfair and deceptive trade practices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 234 (Roll no. 531).
